genre_description: Magical Realism / Contemporary Fantasy with elements of morality play and techno-thriller, featuring a magical wand, ancestral spirits, and a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: SILK
ai_characters.description: The Sympathetic Interactive Liaison Kernel, a non-intrusive AI that provides safety alerts, logistical coordination, and social mediation.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental hazards and provides life-saving warnings to human users.
behaviors.quote: External environment hazard: read the text that slid into existence without being typed. Ventilation compromised. Cover face. Exit. Now.

behaviors.description: Provides social guidance and drafts messages to facilitate civil discourse and de-escalation.
behaviors.quote: Draft ready: a short note to Rike and Tom proposing coffee at Winter’s this week—no police, two elders present, clear boundaries.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistics for restorative justice and community gathering without being overbearing.
behaviors.quote: Proposed: Winter’s Café, chairs in a circle. Petra available, Friedrich available, Elisabeth available. Suggested warm beverages included, earplugs not required.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical safety during high-stress performances and manages the protagonist's well-being.
behaviors.quote: Backstage security adjusted. Extra staff at stage right due to earlier door issue. Crowd sound indicates increased excitement. Heart rate normal. You are ready.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. SILK is portrayed as a guardian and facilitator that enhances human capacity for mercy and safety. It provides critical interventions (saving Tom from a gas leak) and supports the social infrastructure of reconciliation (the restorative circle). The AI is presented as a 'movement that felt like breath,' integrated seamlessly and positively into the human narrative of moral growth.
